name: minting
description: Shows most minted NFT projects for the past hour. Require 10 coins.
title: Minting Projects

name: recent
description: Shows recent NFT collections added to OpenSea. Require 10 coins.
title: Recently Added Collections

name: trending
description: Shows trending NFT twitter accounts for the past 24 hours. Require 10 coins.
title: Trending Twitter Accounts

name: upcoming
description: Shows upcoming NFT mints for tomorrows date. Require 10 coins.
title: Upcoming NFT Projects

name: whitelists
description: Shows upcoming prominent NFT collections. Require 10 coins.
title: Collections Whitelists
